title: Polish Me Silly,Sea Me Glow- Neon Green Blue Yellow Gold "Glow Pop Nail Polish Collection" Multi-Color Shifting: Mylar Oil Slick, Vegan & Cruelty-Free Nail Polish, 0.5 Fl. Oz. (15 mL)
description: Sea Me Glow is GORGEOUS! It's a neon blue with a stunning Neon Green Blue Yellow Gold shine/shimmer throughout this polish. The primary color is a beautiful bright neon blue with a stunning Neon Green Blue Yellow Gold shimmer at all times and will shift throughout all the different colors listed as shown in the photos! It looks different in all different lighting situations... indoors and outdoors! This polish requires 2 to 3 thick coats to achieve your desired look without a basecoat. This polish is very smooth to the touch. Always finish your manicure with a great top coat! ***DISCLAIMER: THE COLORS/POLISHES IN THE PHOTOS ABOVE MAY BE ALTERED DUE TO LIGHTING, CAMERA QUALITY AND SATURATION. These photos represent a moment in time under special lighting conditions***♥ This listing is for ONE FULL SIZE (0.5 oz. / 15ml) bottle. ♥ All of our polishes are custom- blended and they have loose cosmetic-grade glitters, micas and colorants. They are 5 freeNO Dibutyl Phthalate (DBP)NO Formaldehyde and NO Toluene.
details: {"Brand": "Polish Me Silly", "Type": "Top_coat", "Material Feature": "Cruelty Free, Vegan", "Unit Count": "1.00 Count", "Liquid Volume": "0.5 Fluid Ounces"}
